Plot
A Sho in the Kalahari desert encounters technology for the first time
in the shape of a Coke bottle. He takes it back to his people, 
and they use it for many tasks. The people start to fight over it, so 
he decides to return it to the God--where he thinks it came from. 
Meanwhile, we are introduced to a school teacher assigned to a small 
village, a despotic revolutionary, and a clumsy biologist.
